pkgmetadata.longdescription: GluonCV Python Package=========================`GluonCV <https://gluon-cv.mxnet.io>`_ provides implementations of the state-of-the-art (SOTA) deep learning models in computer vision.It is designed for engineers, researchers, and students to fast prototype products and research ideas based on these models.Installation------------To install, use:.. code-block:: bash pip install gluoncv mxnet>=1.6.0 --upgrade # for installing gluoncv with all dependencies pip install gluoncv[full] mxnet>=1.6.0 --upgradeTo enable different hardware supports such as GPUs, check out `mxnet variants <https://pypi.org/project/mxnet/>`_.For example, you can install cuda-11.0 supported mxnet alongside gluoncv:.. code-block:: bash pip install gluoncv mxnet-cu110>=1.6.0 --upgrade
